About

Seth Greco    Full-Stack Engineer    Web Developer

 I am a recent graduate from the University of Texas at San Antonio, having obtained a degree in Computer Science with a concentration in software engineering. Through my studies I found web-development to be the most compelling & fun the tech field has to offer.   I am a full stack developer using my experince with languages Python & Java, frameworks such as Django & Express, & Libraries like React. & HTML, CSS, Javascript, Mysql, MongoDB & other web related technologies to make a robust skillset.
